title: Intel 7980XE & 7960X Review - i9 Rips into Threadripper
description: The new i9 CPUs are finally here! Meet the 18-core/36-thread 7980XE and 16-core/32-thread 7960X processors that cost a fortune and have the performance to back it up. Let's find out if they're worth it after performing a suite of benchmarks!   FULL Written Review    **Sponsors** The all new NZXT HUE+ in White   Use 'HWC10' code for 10% off (US Only) at   Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by Intel. This video is sponsored by NZXT. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no video direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  ------------------------------------------------------- Music by Silk Music:   #7980XE #7960X #intel #hardwarecanucks
